sentences.en: As the disease progresses, the mucosal erosions coalesce to linear ulcers that undermine remaining mucosa.
sentences.cn: 随着病程的发展, 粘膜损害发生融合,破坏残留的粘膜以至形成线性溃疡.

sentences.en: As the number of moisture droplets increases, they begin to coalesce into small rivulets of fluid.
sentences.cn: 当水滴数量增加，它们会汇集成细流。

sentences.en: Cities, if unrestricted, tend to coalesce into bigger and bigger conurbations.
sentences.cn: 如果不加限制，城市往往会联合发展成越来越大的集合城市。

sentences.en: For both systems a cloud or train of bubbles may coalesce to give larger bubbles.
sentences.cn: 对这两个系统来说,一群或一串气泡都可以合并成较大的气泡.

sentences.en: Gas bubbles coalesce to grow as they rise.
sentences.cn: 气泡在上升中聚集成长.

sentences.en: I hope patriotism can coalesce under this kind of idea and express itself.
sentences.cn: 愿爱国主义在这样的理念下凝聚起来,表达出来.

sentences.en: Particles do not coalesce with other particles.
She and Wall - E communicate in chirps and beeps that occasionally coalesce into words.
sentences.cn: 她和瓦力通过喳喳叽叽的声音交流,有时候能够拼成词语.

sentences.en: The soft powder fired at high temperature ceramic particles melt and coalesce to form a glaze.
sentences.cn: 松软的粉末在高温下烧结,陶土粒子即溶结成一层瓷釉.

sentences.en: Typically the skin lesions begin as petechial or small purpuric areas which gradually coalesce ( see below ).
sentences.cn: 典型的皮肤病损开始于淤点或小的紫斑并逐渐融合 ( 如图 ).
